name: Toothbrush Holder for Bathroom,Plastic Detachable for Easy Cleaning Multi-Functional Storage,3 Slots Anti-Slip Electric Toothbrush and Toothpaste Organizer Caddy for Bathroom Vanity,Countertop (Grey)
short_description: 【Easy Cleaning】➤The bathroom toothbrush holder has a divider for 3 compartment divided storage,the divider and bottom all can be easily pulled out to allow full access to the interior,let cleaning more thoroughly. 【Detachable & No Damp】➤The bottom of the tooth brushing holder is detachable.Unlike other toothbrush holders,It has two drainage holes at the bottom and two sets of ventilation holes on the cup body,these features allow water can be drained when needed,More importantly,it allows air to circulate so the base of your toothpaste and toothbrushes are not sitting in water and dampness. 【Premium Material】➤Made of high quality PP+ABS material,rustproof,strong and durable,which is low-risk for breakage even in a busy household with high-volume traffic.The holder body is square shape,not easy to tip over.At the same tiem,It can be easily cleaned with soap and water.Ideal for compact spaces on bathroom counters,in cabinets,or under the sink. 【Toothbrush Holder Size】➤The square shape electric toothbrush holder size:L3.7"×W3.5"×H4.5",more stable on the counter.4 round non-slip rubber pads on the bottom help it grip the counter as well,Prevent the toothbrush and toothpaste holder from sliding on wet countertop.Plastic toothbrush holder gives you ample space to keep your toothpaste,electric toothbrush, razor, floss,tongue scraper,dental tools,comb,scissors,makeup brush and more organized and close at hand. 【100% Satisfaction】➤Our team of professionals is constantly working to make you satisfied.And any questions about the tooth brush holder cup, please also feel free to contact me so that I can help you solve the problem as soon as possible.

name: Diatomite Toothbrush Holders for Bathrooms, Electric Toothbrush and Toothpaste Holder 3 Slots Tooth Brush Organizer for Bathroom Countertop, Shower, Vanity - Marble White
short_description: Soaks Up Water Quickly: This tooth brushing holder is made of natural diatomaceous earth, which is super-absorbent. When the toothbrush drips, it also effectively absorbs the water left inside so you don't have to constantly clean it or wipe it down. Individual Compartment Design: This bathroom toothbrush holder has 3 sections to keep electric toothbrush and toothpaste in one spot, as well as providing efficient storage for razors, makeup brushes, tongue scrapers and other bathroom essentials. Aesthetic Appeal: The electric toothbrush holder has an elegant and modern look that is the perfect complement to bathroom decor. Available in three different styles that will blend in well with most decor color schemes. Mutifunctional: The toothbrush stand can be use a bathroom countertop organizer for toothbrush, electric toothbrush, toothpaste, facial cleanser, shaver, tongue cleaner and other oral care tools. This toothbrush organizer is also suitable for vanity top, cabinet, shower shelf, kitchen sink, office, college dorm, appartments and other small space, keeping your countertops clean and tidy. Perfect Size: Each kids toothbrush holder measures 3.8×3.8×3.9 inches, square shape, which is perfect for compact palce. To avoid scratching the surface, the bottom of the shower toothbrush holder has rubber pads.
